misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a competitor hailing from Golf Pirkkala, is set to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Known for his contemplative approach to the game, Ofri resides in Tampere, Finland, where he hones his skills and strategies for competitive play.

This year marks Ofri's third appearance at the esteemed Hector Trophée, an event he approaches with both eagerness and respect. While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Ofri remains focused on the nuances of the game and the camaraderie it fosters.

Off the course, Ofri is known to appreciate the thoughtful course designs of the late Kosti Kuronen, who passed away in 2024. He believes that Kosti's work represents the beautiful subtleties of golf course design, and strives to emulate a similar level of detail in his own game.
